title: Anunoby shines as Knicks beat Spurs to win NBA Cup
subtitle: OG Anunoby scores 28 points as the New York Knicks end their 52-year trophy drought by beating the San Antonio Spurs in the NBA Cup final.
full_text: OG Anunoby scores 28 points as the New York Knicks end their 52-year trophy drought by beating the San Antonio Spurs in the NBA Cup final.
